A

addSegment(Segment) - Method in class eu.jacquet80.minigeo.MapWindow
Adds a segment to the list of segments to display.
addSegments(Collection<Segment>) - Method in class eu.jacquet80.minigeo.MapWindow
Adds a whole collection of segments to the list of segments to display

C

clearSegments() - Method in class eu.jacquet80.minigeo.MapWindow
Deletes all the registered segments.

E

eu.jacquet80.minigeo - package eu.jacquet80.minigeo
Minigeo is a lightweight Java library that allows one to plot geographical data (namely lines between points determined by a latitude-longitude pair), using Universal Transverse Mercator (UTM) projections.

G

getColor() - Method in class eu.jacquet80.minigeo.Segment
Returns the color of the segment
getLatitude() - Method in class eu.jacquet80.minigeo.Point
Returns the latitude of the point.
getLongitude() - Method in class eu.jacquet80.minigeo.Point
Returns the longitude of the point.
getPointA() - Method in class eu.jacquet80.minigeo.Segment
Returns the first point of the segment ("A")
getPointB() - Method in class eu.jacquet80.minigeo.Segment
Returns the second point of the segment ("B")

M

MapWindow - Class in eu.jacquet80.minigeo
Window that may display a set of segments, with support for panning and zooming.
MapWindow() - Constructor for class eu.jacquet80.minigeo.MapWindow
Creates a new window.

P

Point - Class in eu.jacquet80.minigeo
Geographic point, specified by its coordinates.
Point(double, double) - Constructor for class eu.jacquet80.minigeo.Point
Creates a new point, given its coordinates according to the WGS84 datum.

S

Segment - Class in eu.jacquet80.minigeo
Segment of a linear shape, such as a road.
Segment(Point, Point, Color) - Constructor for class eu.jacquet80.minigeo.Segment
Creates a new segment.
